content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities like the supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for a fair price, considering the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds great, Mister Schmidt. I'm interested in renting your apartment. How much are you asking for the rental price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I was thinking of 1500 Euros per month. I'm sure you'll find it a fair price for the value you're getting.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds a bit high. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. Can you lower the price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Well, Emilia, I can surely understand your situation, but this is a prime location, and the apartment is of high quality. However, considering your situation, I can lower the price to 1400 Euros per month. It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll find it worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. I was hoping for something more in the range of 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand your need for a cheaper apartment, but 800 Euros is way below my expected price range. I'm willing to be flexible, but not to that extent. I can lower the price to 1300 Euros per month, but I cannot go any further without compromising the value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mister Schmidt. However, 1300 Euros is still out of my budget. I was hoping for something closer to 900 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm sorry, but 900 Euros is quite a bit lower than my minimum price. I've already lowered the price significantly, and going any lower would be unfair to me as a landlord. I can lower the price to 1250 Euros per month, but that's the lowest I can go without compromising the value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's very generous of you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your understanding. I'll take the apartment at 1250 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
